name: Proposed_Resolution_20-1073.pdf
text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-1073 (Deemed Approved November 22, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4764

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
October 7,
2014

To confirm the re-appointment of Ms. Michelle Y. Rose to the Board of Social Work.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Social Work Michelle Y. Rose Confirmation Resolution
of 2014".
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the re-appointment of:
Ms. Michelle Y. Rose
2607 Douglas Road S.E., #203
Washington, D.C. 20020
(Ward 8)
as a consumer member of the Board of Social Work, established by section 212 of the District of
Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, effective March 25, 1985 (D.C. Law 6-99;
D.C. Official Code § 3-1201.12), and in accordance with section 2 of the Confirmation Act of
1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142; D.C. Official Code § 1-523.01), for a term to
end March 3, 2017.
Sec. 3. The Secretary to the Council shall transmit a copy of this resolution, upon its
adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect i1nmediately.

Board of
Social Work
Michelle Y.
Rose
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
title: Board of Social Work Michelle Y. Rose Confirmation Resolution of 2014
